ai-thig5.4:1.1_0: Nandā, see this bag of bones as
ai-thig5.4:1.3_0: With your mind unified and serene,
ai-thig5.4:2.1_0: As this is, so is that;
ai-thig5.4:2.2_0: as this is, so is that;
ai-thig5.4:2.3_0: A foul stink wafts from it,
ai-thig5.4:3.1_0: Reviewing my body in such a way,
ai-thig5.4:3.4_0: with my own wisdom, I saw.
ai-thig5.4:5.1_0: Then, growing disillusioned with my body,
